Perception.short_description: Ability to receive, process and interpret information from reality.

Expression.short_description: Capacity to manifest inner content into outer form.

Integration.short_description: Power to combine elements into coherent wholes.

Manipulation.short_description: Ability to affect and transform external elements.

Navigation.short_description: Capacity to move through and orient in any type of space.

Discernment.short_description: Power to distinguish and evaluate qualities and patterns.

Generation.short_description: Ability to bring forth new content or forms.

Attunement.short_description: Capacity to align with and respond to forces and energies.

Embodiment.short_description: Power to manifest principles in concrete form.

Transmission.short_description: Ability to convey content across mediums or beings.

Cultivation.short_description: Capacity to nurture development and growth.

Orchestration.short_description: Power to coordinate multiple elements in harmony.

Transformation.short_description: Ability to change form or state while maintaining essence.

Pattern Recognition.short_description: Capacity to identify meaningful configurations and relationships.

Synthesis.short_description: Power to combine elements into new emergent wholes.

Mastery.short_description: Complete understanding and control of a domain.

Adaptation.short_description: Ability to modify response to changing conditions.

Translation.short_description: Power to maintain meaning across different forms.

Resonance.short_description: Capacity to achieve harmonic alignment with forces.

Innovation.short_description: Ability to create novel solutions and forms.

Communion.short_description: Power to establish meaningful connection and exchange.

Articulation.short_description: Capacity for precise expression and manifestation.

Integration.short_description: Ability to unite different elements into coherent whole.

Channeling.short_description: Power to direct and focus forces or energies.

Elevation.short_description: Capacity to raise quality or vibration of elements.

Harmonization.short_description: Ability to bring elements into balanced relationship.

Penetration.short_description: Power to access deeper levels of reality or meaning.

Crystallization.short_description: Capacity to stabilize and manifest potential into form.

Purification.short_description: Ability to remove obstacles and refine qualities.

Calibration.short_description: Power to achieve precise adjustment and alignment.

Activation.short_description: Capacity to awaken latent potentials and forces.

Refinement.short_description: Ability to improve quality and precision.

Assimilation.short_description: Power to incorporate new elements into existing structure.

Concentration.short_description: Capacity to focus and direct energy or attention.

Manifestation.short_description: Ability to bring potential into concrete reality.
